Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a tiebreaking solo homer in the ninth inning
Blake Perkins made a leaping grab to rob Noelvi Marte of a potential go-ahead homer
Milwaukee Brewers achieved their fifth consecutive win
Pre-Game Insights: Milwaukee Brewers reduced their magic number to 16 for clinching the NL Central title
Brewers manager Pat Murphy emphasized the team's resilience and preparation
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers manager Pat Murphy praised the team's defensive plays and pitching
Cincinnati Reds manager David Bell acknowledged the Brewers' strong performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Milwaukee Brewers became the third team to reach 80 wins this season
Reds starter Fernando Cruz made his second consecutive start
